title: #33: More with Bill Thomas Discussing the Colonial Parkway Murders
description:
The Real Crime Profile team (Jim Clemente, Laura Richards and Lisa Zambetti) are joined by special guest Bill Thomas to continue discussing the murders of Cathy Thomas and Becky Dowski and the five other young couples killed between 1986 and 1996. They discuss the FBI crime scene photos and media leak, the victimology, which cases are linked and the modus operandi. #HerNameWasCathy #HerNameWasBecky
#ColonialParkwayMurders

Thank you to our sponsors Audible and Blue Apron! You can support the show and visit them here:
